channel.title: PwnScape #317
channel.description:
Hey guys,
It is called [size=18pt][font=times new roman]PwnScape[/font][/size] #317 :)
Well it is time to bring back the game that people miss. I will do my best to make this server as close to the Old School way that Runescape use to be. It will be a very good adventure for everyone and its not hard to make because i have found my own ways to make this easy.
I have made methods for dialogues and quest and making life easier for myself and for others in future.
Here we go <3
Features: New dialogue method. New Drop system by me New Pest Control. New Fight Pits. Membership system added. (Will be free to play but members features for a second world.) Edited attack Formula. More coming soon.
Images: coming soon.
[b]Credits:[/b] Devolution Galkon Dust R I P Lsm1107
Wish me luck :)<3

And it used to be pretty populair too…

But I’m assuming you just used the name?

Hey guys,

It is called [size=18pt][font=times new roman]PwnScape[/font][/size] #317

Well it is time to bring back the game that people miss.
I will do my best to make this server as close to the Old School way that Runescape use to be.
